scripts.setup: npm run setup:npm -s && npm run setup:jshint -s && npm run setup:less -s && npm run setup:uglify-js -s && npm run setup:bower -s
scripts.clean: rm -rf _sites && rm -rf assets && rm -rf styleguide && mkdir "assets" && mkdir "assets/css" && mkdir "assets/img" && mkdir "assets/js"
scripts.build: npm run build:css -s && npm run build:images -s && npm run build:jquery -s  && npm run build:js -s
scripts.build:css: npm run build:stylesheet -s && npm run build:styleguide -s
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run livereload" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
